00038 namespace Ogre {
00066     class _OgreExport Billboard : public FXAlloc
00067     {
00068         friend class BillboardSet;
00069         friend class BillboardParticleRenderer;
00070     protected:
00071         bool mOwnDimensions;
00072         bool mUseTexcoordRect;
00073         uint16 mTexcoordIndex;      // index into the BillboardSet array of texture coordinates
00074         FloatRect mTexcoordRect;    // individual texture coordinates
00075         Real mWidth;
00076         Real mHeight;
00077     public:
00078         // Note the intentional public access to main internal variables used at runtime
00079         // Forcing access via get/set would be too costly for 000's of billboards
00080         Vector3 mPosition;
00081         // Normalised direction vector
00082         Vector3 mDirection;
00083         BillboardSet* mParentSet;
00084         ColourValue mColour;
00085         Radian mRotation;
00086 
00089         Billboard();

00093         ~Billboard();

00098

00104

00110 
00116         void setPosition(const Vector3& position);
00117 
00123         void setPosition(Real x, Real y, Real z);
00124

00131

00140

00150

00154
